interestingcomments.content: Hello, my name is Alex, I registered on this board few months ago for providing info on my M4-P but I forgot to introduce myself at that time, now with winter also finished I can get better light to shoot outdoors. I ONLY shoot film because I was raised with the idea that artistic photography is just analogic, I am an avid collector of old cameras and regarding Leica I have a small collection: a M3, the M4-P I wrote about, an M5 and a 1940 Leica IIIb. I also have a DR Summicron, a 35 mm f2.8 Summaron, a 90 mm Elmarit and a Summitar, plus many Soviet lenses. This is my humble M3 system, I am still looking for the right 135mm: --img--  I would like to understand why on this board my links to tinypic don't work!--img--  Also...is this a forum of Strict Leica observance or is it also possible to post other stuff, for instance SLR shoots? Will I banned for that?--img--

interestingcomments.content: Hey everybody, Let's introduce myself. My name is Remco, living in the Netherlands and a Leica-user since 1992. My first Leica was a M4-2 and after that i bought a M-6 and recently a M-9. My main interest in photography is documentary, people and travel. I'am also interested in Leica-history, i own a couple of antique Leica's. ( IIIF, III, M3) Hope to see a lot of photo's on the forum and to join the discussions. greetings, Remco
